description.value:
Skirting the edge of Techno-Heresy. These servitors are human-sized and shaped yet are almost entirely lacking in living tissue whilst capable of concerningly human-like responses. Only a fool would try to pass them off as human though, the Mechanicus have burned worlds for less.

Requirements

See Bestiary/InqHandbook Pg 141.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: 20000 T
